caption: Cloud Resources Inventory Info
description: Cloud Resources Inventory Info events report cloud asset inventory data that is either logged or proactively collected. For example, when collecting cloud resource information from a Configuration Management Database (CMDB), Cyber Asset Attack Surface Management (CAASM), direct public cloud service provider APIs, Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) APIs, and otherwise.
name: cloud_resources_inventory_info

resource_details.description: The device that is being discovered by an inventory process.
